my wife is legally deaf.
My home is my sanctuary, a place where I can relax and be myself.

I am a recent college grad who donates blood in honor of my late sister.

content.text: I just spent my birthday at home with my cat, Leroy Jenkins.
That sounds like a wonderful way to spend your birthday. I usually start my day with a quick cup of coffee and read the news while I feed my dog.
That sounds like a great way to start your day. I like to put on my favorite blues record and write about my feelings.
I love blues music. It's so relaxing and soulful. I'm a marathon runner, so I have to get up early every day to train.
That's impressive. I'm not athletic at all. I'm more of a homebody. I love spending time in my sanctuary, which is my home.
I love that. I'm the same way. My home is my favorite place to be. I'm from San Francisco, and I love the city. It's so vibrant and diverse.
I've never been to San Francisco, but I've heard great things about it. I'm from a small town in the Midwest. It's very different from San Francisco, but I love it here.
I'm sure you do. Small towns are so charming. I'm glad you're happy there.
